ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: hearts that Day will be pounding
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Hearts will pound loudly on that day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On that Day some hearts shall tremble (with fright),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Many a heart will flutter on that day!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Hearts on that day shall palpitate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: hearts upon that day shall be athrob
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: On that day hearts beat painfully
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hearts on that Day will be throbbing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: hearts will be trembling on that day,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Hearts that Day will be in agitation;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Some) hearts that Day will shake with fear and anxiety.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: hearts will throb on that Day
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Hearts on that Day will be pounding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:8] on that day hearts will be trembling, frightened and anxious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 726 (On that day) which is the Day of Judgement (hearts beat painfully) the hearts are fearful
